tasks

Class TaskMandelbrot

  • java.lang.Object
    • tasks.TaskMandelbrot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Task<Result<ChunkMandelbrot>>, java.io.Serializable, java.util.concurrent.Callable<Result<ChunkMandelbrot>>

    public class TaskMandelbrot
extends java.lang.Object
implements Task<Result<ChunkMandelbrot>>
    Task for deconstructing the Mandlebrot job. Each task corresponds to a single row.
    Author:
    Michael Nekrasov, Roman Kazarin
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
